burnPairs(uint256).notice: Burn complete pairs (1 YES + 1 NO) to get 1 wei back

buyNo().notice: Buy NO tokens by minting pairs and swapping YES to NO

buyYes().notice: Buy YES tokens by minting pairs and swapping NO to YES

previewBuyNo(uint256).notice: Calculate how much NO you'd get for buying with ETH amount

previewBuyYes(uint256).notice: Calculate how much YES you'd get for buying with ETH amount

redeem().notice: Redeem winning tokens for ETH (1:1 ratio)

resolve(bool).notice: Resolve the market (only resolver can call)

swapNoToYes(uint256).notice: Swap NO tokens for YES tokens

swapYesToNo(uint256).notice: Swap YES tokens for NO tokens

withdrawFees().notice: Emergency function to allow resolver to withdraw fees
